meaningMnemonic: There are some <radical>horns</radical> on the <radical>ground</radical> next to <radical>fins</radical> on a <radical>plate</radical> that are meant to <kanji>benefit</kanji> everyone. If you're a member of this town, one of your benefits is this little set up.
